Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Allows ticket resellers to renew their license at no cost if all other license requirements are met
Summary: Allows ticket resellers that were licensed in 2020 to renew their license at no cost if all other license requirements are met.
ActClause: AN ACT to allow ticket resellers to renew their license at no cost if all other license requirements are met; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
